channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech iView -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advantech iView -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2142|2024-08-03T00:24:44.279Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a SQL injection with high attack complexity, which may allow an unauthorized attacker to disclose information.

item.title: CVE-2022-2135|2024-08-03T00:24:44.328Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to multiple SQL injections, which may allow an unauthorized attacker to disclose information.

item.title: CVE-2022-2136|2024-08-03T00:24:44.200Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to multiple SQL injections that require low privileges for exploitation and may allow an unauthorized attacker to disclose information.

item.title: CVE-2022-2143|2024-08-03T00:24:44.411Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to two instances of command injection, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-2138|2024-08-03T00:24:44.355Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable due to missing authentication, which may allow an attacker to read or modify sensitive data and execute arbitrary code, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-2137|2024-08-03T00:24:44.261Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to two SQL injections that require high privileges for exploitation and may allow an unauthorized attacker to disclose information

item.title: CVE-2022-2139|2024-08-03T00:24:44.327Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to directory traversal, which may allow an attacker to access unauthorized files and execute arbitrary code.
